korean: 그렇게 하자. 원래 숙소에 짐을 놓고 밥을 먹기로 했는데 밥부터 먹고 숙소로 가야 할 것 같아.
english: Let's do that. We planned to put our bags in our lodging and go eat but I think we need to eat and then go to our lodgings.
I celebrated with my family while eating dinner.

korean: 나도 다시 이집트에서 너와 너희 가족 들을 만나고 싶어.
english: I'd love to meet your family and you again In Egypt.

korean: 내가 먹은 음식은 목살 스테이크와 까르보나라이에요.
english: The food I ate was pork chop steak and carbonara.

korean: 모래내 시장에서는 어떤 장면이 촬영 되었나요?
english: What kind of scenes were taken in Moranae market?

korean: 이제 나는 원어민 수업을 받지 않아.
english: I don't take native english class any more.

korean: 지금 남아있는 종이컵이 없는데 혹시 입구 쪽에 있는 정수기를 이용해 주시겠어요?
english: There is none left at the moment. Could you use the machine by the entrance, instead?

korean: 그는 이번 학기 까지만 공부하고 한국으로 돌아 갈 것이에요.
english: He will study until this semester and go back to Korea.
The second semester will come just as quickly, you know?
It is because illustration work is not my specialty.
